derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French tulipe, via Turkish from Persian dulband 'turban', from the shape of the expanded flower

encyclopedia.content: 郁金香的本意是一种花卉，在植物分类学上，是一类属于百合科郁金香属的具球茎草本植物，是荷兰的国花。也有以郁金香为题的诗词，另外女歌手郁可唯的粉丝团也以此为名。

entry.def: Tulips are brightly coloured flowers that grow in the spring, and have oval or pointed petals packed closely together.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous perennial bulbous herbs having linear or broadly lanceolate leaves and usually a single showy flower
